targets.expr:
quantile(0.5,
        # Week one
        label_replace(
          avg_over_time(
            gitlab_service_ops:rate[4h] offset 166h # 1 week - 2 hours
          )
          + gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w - gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w offset 1w
          , "p", "1w", "", "")
        or
        # Week two
        label_replace(
          avg_over_time(
            gitlab_service_ops:rate[4h] offset 334h # 2 weeks - 2 hours
          )
          + gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w - gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w offset 2w
          , "p", "2w", "", "")
        or
        # Week three
        label_replace(
          avg_over_time(
            gitlab_service_ops:rate[4h] offset 502h # 3 weeks - 2 hours
          )
          + gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w - gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w offset 3w
          , "p", "3w", "", "")
      )
      without (p)

sum(
      quantile(0.5,
        label_replace(
          avg_over_time(
            gitlab_service_ops:rate{type="$type"}[4h] offset 166h # 1 week - 2 hours
          )
          + gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w - gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w offset 1w
          , "p", "1w", "", "")
        or
        label_replace(
          avg_over_time(
            gitlab_service_ops:rate{type="$type"}[4h] offset 334h # 2 weeks - 2 hours
          )
          + gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w - gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w offset 2w
          , "p", "2w", "", "") 
        or
        label_replace(
          avg_over_time(
            gitlab_service_ops:rate{type="$type"}[4h] offset 502h # 3 weeks - 2 hours
          )
          + gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w - gitlab_service_ops:rate:avg_over_time_1w offset 3w
          , "p", "3w", "", "") 
      )
      without (p)
)
